org.rakiura.cpn
Class NetVisitorAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.rakiura.cpn.NetVisitorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, NetVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLSerializer
public abstract class NetVisitorAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetVisitor

Utility class for graph traversal. All methods implementations are empty in this adapter, the only default implementation is provided for depth-first subnets traversal, i.e. all subnets will be visited by this net visitor in depth first manner. To provide different subnet traversal one needs to override net(Net) method.
